entity.name: Samriddha Chattopadhyay
entity.description: I am a solo developer who has been working on open-source projects for several years. My focus is on creating tools that enhance productivity and collaboration, and I love building interesting things that can help more people get better at software development.

projects.name: Github Wiki Generator
projects.description: The Github Wiki Generator is a tool that simplifies the process of creating and managing wikis on GitHub. It provides a user-friendly interface and powerful features to enhance collaboration and documentation in GitHub projects

channels.description: Will accept direct bank transfers. Please e-mail me for details.
Pay with your debit/credit card through this gateway and setup recurring subscriptions.

plans.name: Hosting support
plans.description: This will cover the monthly server hosting costs for the projects.

plans.name: Developer compensation
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one developer working part-time on the projects.

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project.

history.description: Started building the Github Wiki Generator project.
